page.title: 16GAMES TO PLAY.S.HEDINGHAM
page.content: This is a{game}we play at school.It is called{Black Cat.}You need six people to play the{game.}One person goes ten steps away from the main group and turns their back to the group.She is called{Black Cat.}The group then begin to move towards him{Black Cat}turns around,if she sees anyone moving they must stand still. This continues until everyone has been seen. The group then joins hands in a line,{Black Cat}weaves in and out of them telling a story,when he says {Black Cat}in the story everyone has to run away. The person who gets caught then becomes{Black Cat.}The{game}then starts all over again. There is no time limit to this {game.} This{game}is very popular with girls but not many boys play it.
